name: ESOPHAGEAL CANCER ACTION NETWORK (ECAN)
description: Provide support for esophageal cancer patients and esophageal cancer research
sampleDescriptions: Inclusion of esophageal cancer in the Department of Defense's Peer-Reviewed Cancer Research Program
